definition: to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil

sentences.english: For as the crackling of thorns under a pot, so [is] the laughter of the fool: this also [is] vanity.
sentences.chinese: 愚昧人的笑聲，好像鍋下燒荊棘的爆聲，這也是虛空。

sentences.english: Passengers then heard what were described as popping noises similar to the sound of firecrackers.
sentences.chinese: 接着乘客們就聽到了被描述爲類似爆竹的振爆聲。

sentences.english: Like the crackling of thorns under the pot, so is the laughter of fools.
sentences.chinese: 愚昧人的笑聲，好像鍋下燒荊棘的爆聲。
